ref_item.label: All patients
ref_item.description: All patients were intended to engage in three different 20-30 min sessions run by research coordinators and spaced a minimum of 4 hours apart to allow for washout of effects, including 1) a commercially available, immersive VR environment, theBlu (WEVR, Inc, Venice, California, USA) delivered via Oculus Rift (Oculus VR, Irvine, California, USA) headset (VR Blu), 2) a non-immersive two-dimensional mimic delivered via a tablet computer (Tablet Blu), and 3) a VR control session delivered via a content-less Oculus Rift headset (VR Blank). The three sessions were run by research coordinators and spaced a minimum of 4 hours apart. The intervention order was counterbalanced using a randomized sequence generator.
interventionNames: Behavioral: Use of Virtual Reality Head Mounted Display without Content (VR Blank)

pred_item.label: VR Sensory Deprivation Control
pred_item.description: Participants will undergo a 20-minute session with VR sensory deprivation: delivered via a blank (ie, content-less) Oculus Rift headset to control for the external sensory deprivation of the VR system.
interventionNames: DEVICE: VR Sensory Deprivation - blank Oculus Rift headset

ref_item.name: Virtual Reality Session (VR Blu)
ref_item.description: 20-30 minute session of virtual reality immersive content.

pred_item.name: Immersive Virtual Reality - theBlu via Oculus Rift
pred_item.description: 20-minute immersive VR experience using theBlu (WEVR, Inc) delivered via Oculus Rift headset. This simulates observing a naturally relaxing and dynamic coral reef environment.

ref_item.name: Tablet-based Session (Tablet Blu)
ref_item.description: 20-30 minute session of tablet-based content that mimics the content from virtual reality sessions.

pred_item.name: Non-immersive 2D tablet - theBlu video
pred_item.description: 20-minute session viewing a recording of the theBlu experience delivered via video on a non-immersive 2-D Asus tablet.

ref_item.name: Use of Virtual Reality Head Mounted Display without Content (VR Blank)
ref_item.description: 20-30 minutes session using head mounted display to reduce light and sound.

pred_item.name: VR Sensory Deprivation - blank Oculus Rift headset
pred_item.description: 20-minute session with a blank (content-less) Oculus Rift headset to control for external sensory deprivation effects of the VR system.
